article.title: The physical constraints on a new LoBAL QSO at z=4.82

multiple_choice_question.text: What do the vertical blue dashed lines in Figure 1 represent?
choices: The redshift of the LoBAL QSO
The variability of the CIV absorption troughs
Approximate positions of the Lyβ, Lya, Si IV, and CIV emission lines
The Balnicity Index of the LoBAL QSO

multiple_choice_question.text: What is the maximum detached velocity shown for the absorption lines in Figure 3?
What does the black dashed line in Figure 7 represent?
choices: The Mg II emission line fit

multiple_choice_question.text: In formula (3), what does the variable  'αλ' represent?
choices: The intrinsic slope of the unreddened spectrum
